verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*, \w O|strong="H3050"\w* Jerusalem: \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w O|strong="H3050"\w* Sion.
Because \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath strengthened \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bolts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy gates, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath blessed thy \w children|strong="H1129"\w* within thee.

Who hath \w placed|strong="H7665"\w* peace \w in|strong="H7665"\w* thy borders: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* filleth thee \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* fat \w of|strong="H3820"\w* corn.
\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* sendeth forth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* speech \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth: \w his|strong="H3605"\w* word runneth swiftly.
\w Who|strong="H0369"\w* giveth snow \w like|strong="H7227"\w* wool: scattereth mists \w like|strong="H7227"\w* ashes.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* sendeth \w his|strong="H3068"\w* crystal \w like|strong="H0776"\w* morsels: \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* stand before \w the|strong="H3068"\w* face \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* cold?

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* send out \w his|strong="H3068"\w* word, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* melt \w them|strong="H3068"\w*: \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wind \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* blow, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* waters \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* run.

\w Who|strong="H0776"\w* declareth \w his|strong="H3559"\w* word \w to|strong="H0776"\w* Jacob: \w his|strong="H3559"\w* justices \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* judgments \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H1121"\w* done \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* manner \w to|strong="H5414"\w* every nation: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* judgments \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* manifest \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. Alleluia.
